languages.text: "Тоскливо? Разве не в служении своей стезе кроется величайшая радость? Тебе ли не знать это, Домин'{name}".

traits.locale_text: "Тоскливо? Разве не в верном служении своей стезе кроется величайшая радость слуг Неумирающего? Тебе ли не знать это, Эним'{name}".

languages.text: "Dreary? Is serving one's thread not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know this, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "Тоскливо? Разве не в служении своей стезе кроется величайшая радость? Тебе ли не знать это, Домин'{name}".

traits.locale_text: "Dreary? Is serving one's way not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know, Enim'{name}."
"Dreary? Is serving one's way not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know, Enim'{name}."
"Dreary? Is serving one's way not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know this, Enim'{name}."
"Dreary? Is serving one's way not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know this, Enim'{name}."
"Dreary? Is serving one's thread not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know this, Domin'{name}."
"Dreary? Is serving one's thread not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know this, Domin'{name}."

languages.text: «¿Deprimente? ¿Acaso seguir nuestro hilo no es el mayor placer que existe? Usted debería saberlo mejor que nadie, Domin'{name}».
languages.original_text: "Dreary? Is serving one's thread not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know this, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: «¿Deprimente? ¿Acaso seguir nuestro hilo no es el mayor placer que existe? Usted debería saberlo mejor que nadie, Domin'{name}».

languages.text: 「退屈？自身の糸に奉仕することこそが、至上の喜びではないの？ドミン・{name}、あなたはそのことを知っているはずよ」
languages.original_text: "Dreary? Is serving one's thread not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know this, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: 「退屈？自身の糸に奉仕することこそが、至上の喜びではないの？ドミン・{name}、あなたはそのことを知っているはずよ」

languages.text: “沉闷？沿着自己的丝线前行，难道这不是最大的快乐吗？在所有人里，你应该是最了解这一点的，秘者{name}。”
languages.original_text: "Dreary? Is serving one's thread not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know this, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: “沉闷？沿着自己的丝线前行，难道这不是最大的快乐吗？在所有人里，你应该是最了解这一点的，秘者{name}。”

languages.text: "Trostlos? Ist es nicht die größte aller Freuden, jemandes Faden zu dienen? Das solltet Ihr doch am besten wissen, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "Dreary? Is serving one's thread not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know this, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: "Trostlos? Ist es nicht die größte aller Freuden, jemandes Faden zu dienen? Das solltet Ihr doch am besten wissen, Domin'{name}."

languages.text: « Ennuyeux ? Allons, servir son fil est la plus grande joie que l'on puisse connaître en ce monde. Vous êtes bien {mf|placé|placée} pour le savoir, Domin'{name}. »
languages.original_text: "Dreary? Is serving one's thread not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know this, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: « Ennuyeux ? Allons, servir son fil est la plus grande joie que l'on puisse connaître en ce monde. Vous êtes bien {mf|placé|placée} pour le savoir, Domin'{name}. »

languages.text: "İç karartıcı mı? Birinin ipliğine hizmet etmek, en yüce keyif sayılmıyor mu? Bunu herkesten çok senin bilmen gerek Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "Dreary? Is serving one's thread not the greatest joy there is? You of all people should know this, Domin'{name}."
